壝字的基本解释

壝
wéi
古代祭坛四周的矮墙：“掌设王之社壝。”

壝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wēi］
［《廣韻》以水切，上旨，以。］
［《廣韻》以追切，平脂，以。］
(1)坛、墠及其矮土围墙的总称。
(2)特指坛、墠之外的矮土围墙。
(3)泛指矮土围墙。参见“壝宫”。

壝字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　壝； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页242第02
【廣韻】以水切【集韻】【韻會】愈水切，?音唯。土埒也。　又【集韻】欲鬼切，遺上聲。起土爲埒。一曰壇邊低垣圍繞者爲壝。【周禮·地官】封人掌設王之社壝。【潘岳·藉田賦】封人壝宮。【註】委土起堳埒以爲宮也。　又【集韻】以醉切，音篲。又【廣韻】以追切【集韻】【韻會】夷隹切，?音惟。義?同。

壝字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
壝字的起名意思

暂无。

壝
Basic explanation of words
壝
wéi
The low wall around the ancient altar: "The company of the king is set up."
壝
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wēi］
["Guangyun" cuts with water, puts on the purpose, with. ]
["Guang Yun" to chase cutting, flat fat, to. ]
(1) The general term for altars, roofs and their low earthen walls.
(2) In particular, it refers to the low earthen wall outside the altar and the moat.
(3) Generally refers to low earthen walls. See "Di Palace".
壝
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　壝; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 242 02
[Guangyun] Cut with water [Jiyun] [Rhyme] Cut with more water, sound only. The soil is also.　 [Ji Yun] I want to cut the ghost, and leave it sound. From the earth is 埒. One said that those who surround the altar and the low wall are dim. 【Zhou Li·Guan Guan】Covering people to set up the king's community. 【Pan Yue·Jitian Fu】Fengrendi Palace. 【Note】Wei Tuqi 堳埒 thought it was a palace.　[Jiyun] Cut with drunk, sound bar. And [Guangyun] to chase [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yi Yu cut,? Yin Wei. Righteous? Same.
